Field Detail

LKP_ESCAPES

public static final int[] LKP_ESCAPES
maps how to convert byte to printable java string. 0 => printable, -1 => use '\\uxxxx', else gives escape char.

                       int start,

substring

public static byte[] substring(byte[] src,
                               int start,
                               int len)
Substring of buf. Allows negative indexing as per python. If range of substring outside range of buf, then result is zero-padded. Result will be left justified if start is positive, right-justified if start is negative.

Parameters:
src - src to get sub buf
start - index to start
len - index to end
Returns:
buf len (end - start) containing src

i2b

public static byte[] i2b(int... ia)
Convert int array into byte array with ints as 32-bit big-endian values.

Parameters:
ia - int array
Returns:
ints as byte array as 32-bit big-endian values

Returns:
java-escaped string enclosed in double quotes
